sec.p: The experiments were repeated three times. IC 50 values were calculated using a four parameter logistic curve (Sigma Plot 11.0 (SYSTAT Software, San Jose, CA, USA)). The data are represented as means Â± standard deviations. The results of statistical test were determined by using Sigma Plot 11.0 software and also by using the statistical function t-test in Microsoft Excel. A p value below 0.05 was considered to represent statistical significance.
